title: General Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We’re searching for a flexible, fast-learning Virtual Assistant to help with a variety of tasks—mainly for our Shopify store, but also anything else the business needs.

What You’ll Do:
Manage Shopify store
Take on a wide range of other tasks as assigned (could include research, admin, customer support, etc.)
Learn and use new web/IT tools and automation platforms
Stay organized and keep tasks on track
Tackle problems and figure things out as they come up

What We Need:
Flexibility to handle many different types of work
Willingness to learn new skills (experience is a plus, but not required)
Quick to pick up new things
Strong work ethic and good communication skills
Well-organized and good at managing time
Positive attitude, self-motivated, and a problem-solver

If you’re adaptable, eager to learn, and want a role that changes from day to day, we’d love to hear from you!
